Nitrox Driver API

Pre-Release3.0

The NITROX Macroprocessor provides hardware-based acceleration of cryptographic algorithms and protocol processing. To realize the benefits of this acceleration requires the integration of the NITROX processor into existing hardware, and the integration of the NITROX API calls into the respective software applications and system software. The NITROX Macroprocessor can be integrated in multiple hardware platforms and multiple operating systems.

The NITROX API and device driver software have been designed to achieve the following objectives:

  • High system performance
  • Operating System independence
  • Hardware layer abstraction
  • Error Handling
  • Set of high-level APIs to allow ease of integration and software management.
